chapter.title: What's new in Pustefix 0.20.x
chapter.para: This section lists the new features and enhancements of the current Pustefix release line. If you're interested in new features which already became available with the prior Pustefix release line, you can take a look at .
If you're migrating an existing appliation to the new Pustefix version, you should have a look at .

section.title: What's new in Pustefix 0.20.0
section.para: Added support for custom page URL paths: you can group pages using a common path prefix (so-called page page groups, see ) or map pageflow names to a URL path prefix.

section.title: What's new in Pustefix 0.20.1
section.para: Added a DOM history in development mode, i.e. on the DOM view page, you can not only view last DOM but select an older version from a list of the previously used DOMs.
Added support for headless rendering of Pustefix pages, i.e. you can programmatically do the rendering of a page or part and process the resulting content on the server side.
